</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets for which [[Side]] the entity becomes a "confirmed hostile" target - a target that becomes highlighted red on the sensors display. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> vehicle '''confirmSensorTarget''' [side, isConfirmed]</value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p2 </name>=<value> [side, isConfirmed]: [[Array]]</value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> side: [[Side]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> isConfirmed: [[Boolean]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER4</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>([[vehicle]] [[player]]) [[confirmSensorTarget]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[west]], [[true]]];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
